title: Setting up OBS for webcasting
text:
1 Introduction
Webcasting for biostatistics is the challenge.
Lets take it one step at a time.
Start with the open source project OBS.
Welcome | OBS
Steps to get started. Work with youtube video.
(How to Use OBS Studio)[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-puA85ciDEM]

title: Thomas lab
text:
Director: Professor Ronald G. Thomas School of Public Health UC, San Diego La Jolla, California
Focused on new and interesting data science technologies.

title: Thomas Lab

twitter

The Thomas Lab in the the Herbert Wertheim School of Public Health and Human Longevity Science at UC San Diego focuses on developing data science methodology and educational materials.
